name: Power, and it's Generated Ethically
description:
Run on a treadmill to generate power! Sell that power to buy hamster wheels and other generators, generating more power. And do it all ethically, of course/ Enjoy the endless cycle that is 'alternate' energy sources!

P&GE is an idle game prototype developed for Weekly Game Jam 155 with the theme "Cycle". Other than player, ground, and obstacle art from Pixel Adventure Pack 1, all art assets, music, and code were developed by the team. 

Controls
Press space to jump over obstacles and increase speed and power generation
Obstacles decrease speed and power generation

Team

  • wbschultz - art, code, design
  • singhjason75 -  code, UI, design
  • baharto - code, music, design
  • loafingbread - code, design
  • bardistheword - music, UI, design
